products.title: Chocolate
products.description: Chocolate is a food made from cacao beans. It is used in many desserts like pudding, cakes and candy

products.title: Lollypop
products.description: Lollipops are available in a number of colors and flavors, particularly fruit flavors.

products.title: Ice Cream
products.description: Ice cream is a sweetened frozen food typically eaten as a snack or dessert.
